default.title: Avilash Palace - Smart Mess Management System
default.description: Modern hostel and mess management system for students and administrators. Manage rent, payments, complaints, and more efficiently.
default.keywords: hostel management, mess management, student portal, rent payment, hostel booking
default.author: Avilash Palace Team

home.title: Avilash Palace - Smart Mess Management System
home.description: Welcome to Avilash Palace - Your complete hostel and mess management solution. Manage rent, payments, complaints, and more with ease.
home.keywords: hostel management, mess management, student portal, rent payment, hostel booking, smart hostel

about.title: About Us - Avilash Palace
about.description: Learn about Avilash Palace's mission to revolutionize hostel and mess management. Discover our features, team, and commitment to excellence.
about.keywords: about Avilash Palace, hostel management system, mess management features, our team

features.title: Features - Avilash Palace
features.description: Explore Avilash Palace's comprehensive features including rent management, payment processing, complaint handling, and student portal.
features.keywords: hostel features, rent management, payment system, complaint management, student portal

contact.title: Contact Us - Avilash Palace
contact.description: Get in touch with Avilash Palace team. We're here to help with your hostel and mess management needs. Contact us for support and inquiries.
contact.keywords: contact Avilash Palace, support, help, inquiry, hostel management support

photos.title: Photo Gallery - Avilash Palace
photos.description: View our hostel facilities, rooms, and amenities through our photo gallery. See what makes our hostel the perfect choice for students.
photos.keywords: hostel photos, room gallery, hostel facilities, amenities photos

login_admin.title: Admin Login - Avilash Palace
login_admin.description: Secure admin login portal for Avilash Palace. Access your admin dashboard to manage students, rent, payments, and system settings.
login_admin.keywords: admin login, hostel management admin, secure login

login_student.title: Student Login - Avilash Palace
login_student.description: Student login portal for Avilash Palace. Access your student dashboard to view rent, make payments, submit complaints, and manage your profile.
login_student.keywords: student login, hostel student portal, secure login

admin_dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard - Avilash Palace
admin_dashboard.description: Admin dashboard for comprehensive hostel management. Monitor students, rent collections, payments, complaints, and system analytics.
admin_dashboard.keywords: admin dashboard, hostel management, student management, rent management

admin_students.title: Manage Students - Admin Dashboard
admin_students.description: Manage student information, add new students, edit profiles, and handle student-related operations from the admin dashboard.
admin_students.keywords: student management, add student, edit student, student profiles

admin_category.title: Manage Categories - Admin Dashboard
admin_category.description: Manage hostel categories, room types, and pricing. Configure different accommodation options and their associated costs.
admin_category.keywords: category management, room types, pricing, accommodation options

admin_rent.title: Rent Management - Admin Dashboard
admin_rent.description: Comprehensive rent management system. Track current rent, payment history, and manage rent-related operations efficiently.
admin_rent.keywords: rent management, rent collection, payment tracking, rent history

admin_complaints.title: Complaint Management - Admin Dashboard
admin_complaints.description: Handle and manage student complaints efficiently. Track complaint status, respond to issues, and maintain service quality.
admin_complaints.keywords: complaint management, issue tracking, service quality, complaint resolution

admin_payment_requests.title: Payment Requests - Admin Dashboard
admin_payment_requests.description: Manage payment requests from students. Review, approve, or reject payment requests and maintain financial records.
admin_payment_requests.keywords: payment requests, financial management, payment approval, transaction records

admin_discounts.title: Discount Management - Admin Dashboard
admin_discounts.description: Configure and manage student discounts, special offers, and promotional pricing for hostel accommodations.
admin_discounts.keywords: discount management, special offers, promotional pricing, student discounts

student_dashboard.title: Student Dashboard - Avilash Palace
student_dashboard.description: Your personal student dashboard. View rent details, make payments, submit complaints, and manage your hostel profile.
student_dashboard.keywords: student dashboard, rent details, payments, complaints, profile management

student_rent.title: My Rent - Student Dashboard
student_rent.description: View your current rent status, payment history, and manage rent-related activities from your student dashboard.
student_rent.keywords: my rent, rent status, payment history, rent management

student_profile.title: My Profile - Student Dashboard
student_profile.description: Manage your student profile, update personal information, change password, and maintain your account settings.
student_profile.keywords: student profile, personal information, account settings, profile management

student_complaints.title: My Complaints - Student Dashboard
student_complaints.description: Submit and track your complaints. View complaint status, history, and communicate with admin regarding issues.
student_complaints.keywords: my complaints, submit complaint, complaint tracking, issue reporting

student_payment_requests.title: Payment Requests - Student Dashboard
student_payment_requests.description: Submit payment requests, track their status, and manage your financial transactions with the hostel management.
student_payment_requests.keywords: payment requests, financial transactions, payment tracking, request status

student_rent_history.title: Rent History - Student Dashboard
student_rent_history.description: View your complete rent history, past payments, and financial records from your student dashboard.
student_rent_history.keywords: rent history, payment history, financial records, past transactions
